items.name: knife
items.description: A sharp, serrated hunting knife with a worn, yellow handle.

items.name: book
items.description: A brown, leather-bound book with some sort of archaic logo wrapping the entire cover.

items.name: key
items.description: A tiny, silver key with the word 'Ultrasafe' branded into it.

rooms.name: Room 0
rooms.description:
The room is dimly lit. 
You can see hallways connecting to the north, east and west. 
A gate to the south is covered by a padlock with the word 'Ultrasafe' on it.

rooms.name: Room 1
rooms.description:
The room contains a single wooden post with knife stuck in it. 
Out the window, you can see the rain has started to pick up in earnest.

rooms.name: Room 2
rooms.description:
The room contains a small chair and desk, with an large book opened partway. 
You cannot make out the language the book is in. 
The dim light flickers intermittently.

rooms.name: Room 3
rooms.description: The room contains a single storage locker. At the bottom of the locker, just in reach, is a small silver key.

rooms.name: Room 4
rooms.description: The room contains a physically grotesque individual, who gestures threateningly as you gaze at the EXIT sign behind their head.
